name: Demo Grounds
summary:
Experience intense, team-based action in Demo Grounds, a tactical FPS that takes the genre to new heights with fully destructible environments. Use strategy and skill to plant and defuse bombs, destroy walls to reach your target, and more.

Join a team and face off against 5 others in epic battles where anything can happen. Take advantage of fully dynamic destruction to create paths, catch campers off guard, and create distractions.

Defend against attacks on two bomb sites, always be ready for the unexpected. Plan your strategy, customize your loadout, and emerge as the winning team. Gear up and join the fight now!
